reviews.review:
A blatantly Yuri game of which the plot focuses on love, made by an AAA developer.

This sequel is nothing like the hollow, flat original, in terms of... well, every aspect.
I almost hate the original, but absolutely have to admire this masterpiece.
没玩过的不知道其中的乐趣啊
[insertsciencejokehere]

The perfect sequel. My only complaint for the first game was that it was too short. This game expands heavily on the story making you laugh out loud many times. I was worried the new gels and such might make the puzzles less interesting and more annoying, but Valve did a great job balancing new and old mechanics to create the perfect challenges. Plus they've added a hugely entertaining co-op mode. Another part that I never expected to work so well. If you have Steam you need to have this game series.

A disembodied AI promised me things, then called me fat, stupid, and ugly.

10/10: real-life simulation
One of the best puzzle games i've ever played. The co-op mode is just as good as the single player 10/10 stars. amazing

Ogni livello un enigma nuovo e sempre più complesso, il tutto condito da una trama in grado di riservare qualche colpo di scena. E' un misto tra fps e puzzle game: la grafica è in prima persona, ma con la pistola in dotazione non si spara ai nemici, semplicemente si creano portali per passare da un punto ad un altro della stanza, o da una stanza ad un'altra... Per passare i vari livelli servirà un po' di ingegno, ma confesso che qualche livello mi ha tolto il sonno un paio di notti... Quando tornerete alla vita di tutti i giorni questi portali vi mancheranno! Un titolo anche migliore del primo Portal, da giocare assolutamente!
Excellent game, worth every penny. Every aspect of this game is enjoyable.

Muy bueno. Fiel a la primera parte, con la complejidad y el humor propios de saga. Nuevas características y un modo cooperativo que os mantendrá un buen rato entretenidos a ti y a tu compañero. Si te gustó el anterior, disfrutarás con esta segunda parte.
Ya me lo he pasado, ahora entiendo porque hablan tan bien de él, me ha encantado. =) Y los diálogos son la lecheee, jejeje!!!
This is horror,cake is a lie.

i really like this game because im a fan of puzzles and action and i can tell you that this game is full of it plent of times where i was stumped for quite a while i recomend this game to pretty much anybody.
Super!!
The best logic ever

Würdiger Nachfolger mit vielen neuen Elementen, weiterführende Story die sehr gut erzählt wird und natürlich unzähligen Custom Maps die für fast unendlichen Spielspaß sorgen. Außerdem ein Coop-Modus mit eigener Story und Leveln. Interessant und witzig geschrieben.
Der umfang ist riesig, ca. 4 mal so viel wie in Portal 1.
Für jeden der Portal mag ein muss!
puzzle games are awesome, but even better with hilarious commentary. play it jerk.

If a perfect game could be improved upon, this is it. Portal 2 continues from where Portal left off and finishes with the most beautiful ending possible. This is certainly one of my favorite games in years.
This is awesome, seriously

Everything about this game is amazing. The story is fascinating, the puzzles are challenging, the new mechanics are enjoyable, the characters are lifelike, and the co-op is twice the fun (and twice the difficulty). Combining all this with community maps to challenge you even more, this is not only a worthy sequel good for fans of the first game, but a wonderful game in its own right. Although, I'd play the first game first...

I'm gonna try to do this without exaggerating...
It's been almost 4 years since the launch of this game, and still I find it one of the best games today... Starting by the graphics, you could argue that they are very minimalist, but you know what? They work, they are very simple, and plane, and glitch less... Everything looks really pretty and the effects look really good, without trying too hard, also making it so from a far they don't look bad in a weaker computer... For the sound, dear lord the sound is amazing, it's so immersive and it feels right... I never have epic music when I'm in a quiet part when i'm solving a puzzle, and accordingly I never have silence  in an epic part... But the quietness while solving the puzzles makes it so you can really enjoy how awesome all the sound effects are... The Co-op campaign was extremely fun to play with a friend, the 4 portal system makes really harder puzzles, and the ability to kill your friend at some points followed by Gladus's commentaries creates really humorous parts... And finally the story, without any doubt Portal 2's strongest point, it's immersive, funny, creative, not too long, not too short, doesn't have time wasters... It's just epic...
If you are looking for guaranteed fun in a game, Portal 2 is the thing for you

Graphics - 9
Sound - 10
Story - 10
Online experience - 10
This game is awesome. It's got great dialogue, awesome puzzles, and fantastic atmosphere. This game is 100% worth picking up.

Veredict: 10

The combination of the majestic personality of GLaDoS, the first Portal gameplay and the addition of the new goo mechanics make this game a masterpiece. You personificate Chelly again, and this time you'll have help of Wheatley, the dumbest A.I. ever, to try to escape the Aperture Science facilities.

Try to solve new challeging puzzles while enduring GLaDoS mean jokes and sarcasm towards you. There's nothing more fun than it.

Probably my favorite game on PC. Strategic and funny, i recommend it to anyone!

Following up from Portal, Portal 2 never ceases to amaze me due to the great graphics and adventure that has been put into this game, including co-op where you can figure out puzzles with friends who also have the game.
10/10

It's quirky, it's fun, it's awesome. It is more accessible than Portal 1, which makes it on the whole a bit easier, but don't let that stop you. If you're looking for a challenge, grab Portal Stories: Mel, or head over to the Workshop and grab a few test chambers that will melt your brain.

There is far more content here than there was in Portal 1 (the game is around 3x as long, for one, not to mention multiplayer), so it's well worth it if you're a fan of puzzlers, or FPSs... or both. Get.
Valve does it again. Outstandingly clever, with equally impressive single-player and multiplayer campaigns.
Glados is a potato.
it's fun
I freaking adore this game! Portal and Portal 2 have been 2 of my favorite games for a long time and I love to play them over and over :D
Tis worth eleven gigs of space, friend

Un jeu tout simplement incroyable. Un mélange parfait entre humour, reflexion, créativité, et coopération. Digne successeur de Portal, ceux qui en veulent encore après le 1er opus seront rassasiés. Et si ils ne le sont pas, ils pourront se frotter aux  tests de la communauté.
Le solo est prenant, et suffisamment long (à partir de 10h je pense, cela varie d'un joueur à l'autre). Mais le jeu, déjà captivant, prend tout son intérêt dans la campagne multijoueurs, à 2 en coopération. Les tests y sont de plus en plus difficiles, frôlant parfois l'impossible : on est pas trop de deux, croyez-moi.
La présence de GlaDOS et de ces éternels sarcasmes dans ces deux modes rend le tout très agréable à jouer.

En bref, un jeu à posséder absolument.
Merci VALVe pour cette pépite, dans l'âge d'or du kikou fps suprême. Un vrai bol d'air quand on frisait la noyade.
포탈2

This game is not that great. There is only one gun. Compared to CoD (which has about 6-12 guns) Portal 2 just doesn't cut it. Also, you don't get to kill any people. That is nonsense. There isn't even blood in this game.

Best Game EVAR!
It's still fun after all this time.

GLaDOS may have lost a lot from her botched experiment with you last round, but one thing she never lost was her fervent distain for your existence.  If you have played the first portal (which you should) you will take like the preverbal duck to water to the beginning of this game.  Yet don’t expect more of the same from this sequel, Apertures bots may not be playing with a full deck but they have an ace or two up their sleeves. This Game not only unlocks more of the mystery behind Aperture Laboratories but brings you into the beginnings of GLaDOS herself.  Once you’ve finished with this monstrous storymode there is plenty of fun left to be had in multiplayer mode.  This game takes the cake … no lie.  Rating 10/10

Brilliant game! And contains two of my all time favourite game characters, GlaDos and Cave Motherf*ckin Johnson.

Éste es para mí el auténtico GOTY de 2011. Pese a ser un juego de puzzle no se hace nada repetitivo, la curva de dificultad está muy bien pensada, el guión es simplemente sublime (y te hartas de reir, porque usa un humor inteligente genial), el aspecto gráfico es ideal... En fin, que hay pocos juegos que pueda recomendarte antes que éste. Y si ya disfrutaste el primero, Portal 2 te va a encantar seguro.

Игра гениальная во всех отношениях! Очень интересные головоломки, оригинальные и неповторимые персонажи, занятный сюжет и много Вау-моментов. Кстати о головоломках: они не простые, но и не заоблочно сложные. Успеваешь проийти их до того как они начинают надоедать или бесить. И на последок цитата: 

А, это ты... Давно не виделись... Как дела? Я была так занята, пока была мертва. Ну... после того, как ты убила меня. Ладно. Слушай, мы обе наговорили много такого, о чем ты еще пожалеешь. Но сейчас мы должны забыть про наши разногласия. Ради науки. Ты чудовище.
                                                                        ГЛэДОС
its awesome :D

Words really cannot express how beautiful, brilliant, and hilarious this game is.  I really cant reccomend it enough.  My personal pick for GOTY 2011, and one of the three games that I would give a 10/10.

Portal is a must play for every puzzel gamer. It's original idea and timeless desing makes it one of the best game series in video game history.

Probably the best puzzle game I've ever played. Portal 1 was so good it's hard to believe it could be topped, but it has been! The cool sense of discovery in Portal 1 can't be repeated, but Portal 2 still manages to up the ante puzzle-wise, and create characters even more entertaining and memorable than before. Beware the Mantis Men!

If you played the first Portal then there is no excuse for not playing Portal 2. But on the off chance you had both of your arms chopped off since Portal 2 came out then I am truly sorry. This game is hilarious and innovative, it equals if not surpasses the first stroke of genius. Puzzles will blow your mind and the humor will make you laugh till you puke, YES! PUKE! Buy it, play it, love it.

Bacana.

Non ero molto convinto quando ho installato Portal 2, semplicemente perchè trovavo difficile che si riuscisse a coniugare una trama con un puzzle game. Una trama di un certo livello però, scrivere due righe sono capaci tutti.....
Portal 2 è un capolavoro bello e buono, potrei finire qui. Invece no perchè c'è tanta di quella sostanza in questa produzione che non so dove iniziare....dal lato tecnico magari. L'engine è legerissimo e gira anche su sistemi datati, a patto di scegliere una risoluzione più bassa ma con tutti i dettagli attivati. Le ambientazioni sono dissociate ma giocando si scopre il perchè, dalla prima parte alla seconda parte. Ma lo stile è pulito, godibilissimo, una gioia per gli occhi. Il sonoro è eccellente, non solo per le musiche ma per i toni di voce dei protagonisti che sono qualcosa di mai sentito pima in un videogioco. E qui si apre una partentesi, lunga....Whetly è fenomenale, dissacrante, logorroico, paranoiode, petulante, ironico, cinico. Ed è una scatoletta di metallo con una IA al suo interno!E' incredibile come la Valve sia riuscita a tirare fuori un personaggio simile con queste caratteristiche, un personaggio che ci accompagna in tutta l'avventura e che, per quanto a volte si vorrebbe tirargli un pugno per farlo tacere, non si può non affezionarci. E glaDOS...al pari di Wethely penso sia uno dei personaggi meglio riusciti degli ultimi dieci anni e in Portal 2, raggiunge livelli di assurdo e comicità mai visti primi. Ironia e comicità, sono i pilastri fondamentali di questa produzione e ce se ne accorge da subito, dal primo incontro con Weathley e in tutto il gioco, la cura per le battute, i dialoghi è talmente riuscito che è un peccato finire il tutto.
Paradossalmente la parte meno riuscta del gioco sono gli enigmi...non che siano facilissimi ma si poteva osare di più perchè il gioco ha delle potenzialità incredibili che non sono state sfruttate. Probabilmente per un Half Portal 3......
This is a great game! With fantastic puzzles and lot of witty humor!
